content:
# elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp Monthly Report (November 2025)

## üöÄ Highlights
November's development focused on foundational refinement and maintenance within the MCP plugin. The primary effort involved improving the clarity of core action names to better align with the plugin's scope, renaming `CALL_TOOL` and `READ_RESOURCE` to `CALL_MCP_TOOL` and `READ_MCP_RESOURCE` respectively. These changes were implemented with backward compatibility to ensure a seamless transition for existing integrations. Additionally, the project's core dependency was updated, keeping the plugin current with the broader ElizaOS ecosystem.

## üõ†Ô∏è Key Developments
Work this month centered on a single pull request aimed at enhancing code clarity and maintaining dependencies.

- **Action Name Refinements for Clarity:** To improve namespacing and make the plugin's actions more explicit, key actions were renamed. The changes, introduced in PR [#18](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp/pull/18), included renaming `CALL_TOOL` to `CALL_MCP_TOOL` and `READ_RESOURCE` to `READ_MCP_RESOURCE`. Importantly, these updates were implemented with backward compatibility to prevent breaking changes for users.
- **Dependency Management:** As part of the maintenance effort in PR [#18](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp/pull/18), the `@elizaos/core` dependency was updated to version `^1.5.4`.

## üêõ Issues & Triage
- **Closed Issues:** No issues were closed in November.
- **New & Active Issues:** No new issues were opened during the month, and there were no reports of significant activity on existing issues.

## üí¨ Community & Collaboration
Development activity in November was focused, with all changes consolidated into a single pull request. The provided data does not indicate broader community discussions or contributions for this period.
